text: Inglewood is a city in southwestern Los Angeles County, California, United States, it is southwest of downtown Los Angeles. It was incorporated on February 14, 1908. Its population was 107,762 at the 2020 U.S. Census. The city is in the South Bay region of the greater Los Angeles area.
